title: DailyDoseCode #004
summary: Created my first real auto-posting blog workflow.
content: Today I learned how to publish content by editing a single JSON file. One update now automatically refreshes my homepage and blog without touching HTML. This is my first real step into building systems instead of just pages.

title: DailyDoseCode #003
summary: Expanded the site into a real multi-page platform.
content: Today I converted my site into a structured platform with auto-loading content, blog archives, and monetization readiness.

title: DailyDoseCode #002
content: Learned how to design mobile-first layouts that scale cleanly across devices.

title: DailyDoseCode #001
summary: Launched my site using GitHub Pages.
content: This was the start of building in public with no shortcuts.
